name: MasteringMidlife
0:
”Alexa, open Mastering Midlife”
”Alexa, start Mastering Midlife”
”Alexa, ask Mastering Midlife”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mastering midlife
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mastering Midlife podcast is for you if you’re in your 40s and 50s and asking yourself "what happened?"
For those of us driven to succeed, but concerned about burnout in your work, career, and relationships. It’s the show that teaches you how to thrive when the world asks the most of you.
This podcast will give you tried and tested better alternatives.
Top-selling author and executive coach Mark J. Silverman shares his direct and meaningful conversations with world-leading experts in business, finance, health, and wellbeing.
You don’t have to stop everything and change. You CAN excel in your career and improve and strengthen your life, to achieve sustainable and true success… No compromise.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Mastering Midlife to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Mastering Midlife to start from first episode”
